pr_title: Support branch merge revision exclusion list

timeline.message: SO-4028: Support exclusions from merge operation
SO-4028: Use passed in exclusion id set in StagingArea
SO-4028: Add exclusion merge revision branch index test case

timeline.bodyText:
It would be better to apply the exclusions immediately when we set them on the StagingArea and not relying on a method call with removeExclusions.
Also, this eliminates the actual objects from the StagingArea while I think it would be better to keep them around and just apply the exclusions as a filter on top of them.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText:
I would rename the setExclusions() method to just exclude() and give it a few overloaded versions:
exclude(String...ids)
exclude(Collection<String> ids)
timeline.author: cmark

replies.bodyText: This suggestion is still not implemented, could you please add these as well?
replies.author: nagyo

timeline.message: SO-4028: Track excluded objects without removing from staged objects

timeline.bodyText: Use String...ids varargs here with defensive copy.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: Use Iterable<String> argument here with defensive copy.
timeline.author: cmark
cmark

timeline.bodyText: Please extract the filtered view to a private method, getFilteredStagedObjects()
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.message: SO-4028: Create merge exclude tests for changed, remvoed, new revisions
SO-4028: Use varargs, defensive copy in merge operation exclude setters
SO-4028: Create private method to get filtered staged objects

timeline.author: cmark
cmark

timeline.bodyText: Same here, use ImmutableSet.copyOf(E[] elements). This way you prevent copying the array twice when you use the vararg method.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.message: SO-4028: Use ImmutableSet in defensive copy
